text.value: Confirm family planning details from health passport
Has changed their family planning method?
_Confirm family planning details from health passport_
_Once you submit this form, you will not be able to conduct family planning follow up on . Please confirm if she is on tubal ligation._
_Please counsel and refer them to the health facility._
_Inform to talk to their health provider on usage of back up method during their next clinic appointment_
_Refer to the health facility for FP renewal._
_Refer to go to health facility for family planning service._
Date cannot be in the past!
When is the next appointment date?
Husband/partner doesn't want her to use FP
Why is no longer on family planning?
Is using condoms as a back up method?
Would want to change the FP method she is currently using?
Would want to change the FP method she is currently using?
Which family planning method is using?
Does know the date of the last menstrual cycle?
What is 's approximate date of last cycle?
LMP date should not be more than 9 months ago or in the future
When was the start date of 's last menstrual cycle?

Tsimikizani ngati akutenga njira za kulera poyang'ana m'bukhu la kuchipatala
Tsiku lomwe njira yakulera idzathe mphamvu
Kodi adapatsidwa Tsiku lobweleleranso ku chiptala?
_Tsimikizani ngati akutenga njira za kulera poyang'ana m'bukhu la kuchipatala_
_Simungathenso kupanga kalondolondo wa njira za kulera kwa mukangotumiza folomu iyi. Chonde tsimikizani ngati anatseketsadi._
_Dziwitsani kuti akadziwitse adotolo za zizindikiro zimenezi akadzapitanso kukawonana ndi adotolo._
_Tumizani kuchipatala kuti akatengenso njira ya kulera_
_Mtumizeni kuchipatala kuti akalandire thandizo la kulera_
Ndi njira yanji ya kulera yomwe akutenga?
Abambo akunyumba sakufuna kuti azigwiritsa ntchito njira zakulera
Akuwona zizindikilo zachilendo kamba kogwiritsa ntchito njira za kulera
Kodi n'chifukwa chiyani sakutsatira njira zakulera
Pali zovuta zodza kamba kakugwiritsa ntchito njira ya kulerayi?
Kodi akugwilitsa ntchito makondomu ngati njira ina yothandizira kulera
Kodi akufuna atasintha njira yakulera yomwe akugwilitsa ntchito?
Kodi akufuna atasintha njira ya kulera yomwe akugwiritsa ntchito?
Tsiku lomwe njira yakulera idzathe mphamvu
Kodi akugwiritsa ntchito njira yanji ya kulera?
Kodi akudziwa Tsiku lomwe anasamba komaliza?
Tsiku lomwe akuganizira kuti anamaliza nsambo womaliza
Tsiku losamba lomaliza lisapitilire miyezi 9 yapitayo kapena mtsogolomo
Kodi nsambo wake womaliza anayamba liti?
_Tsimikizani ngati akutenga njira za kulera poyang'ana m'bukhu la kuchipatala_
_Dziwitsani kuti akalankhulane ndi a chipatala pa kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka njira zina zapangozi akapita ku chipatala ulendo otsatira._
_Mtumizeni ku chipatala kuti akalandire thandizo la kulera_
_Pelekezani mai kuchipatala kuti akayezetse ngati ali ndi pakati._
_Tumizani kuchipatala kuti akatengenso njira ya kulera_
_Simungathenso kupanga kalondolondo wa njira za kulera kwa mukangotumiza folomu iyi. Chonde tsimikizani ngati anatseketsadi._
Sakufuna kuulula ngati akutenga njira za kulera
Pali zovuta zodza kamba kakugwiritsa ntchito njira ya kulerayi?
Kodi anayamba wagwiritsapo ntchito njira za kulera zamakono m'mbuyomo?
Kodi akugwilitsa ntchito makondomu ngati njira ina yothandizira kulera?
Kodi akufuna kuyamba kutenga njira ya kulera?
**_Kufufuza za zizindikiro zowopsya kwa amayi a pakati_**
Ntchito iyi idzawoneka ku gawo la Zochita pa
Alibe zovuta zobwera kamba kogwiritsa ntchito njira za kulera
Ali ndi zovuta zobwera kamba kogwiritsa ntchito njira zakulera
**_Kufufuza zovuta zobwera kamba kogwiritsa ntchito njira za kulera_**
**_Kufufuza ngati akukumana ndi zovuta zili zonse kamba ka mankhwala_**
adalembetsa kale mu pulogalamu ya ART
_ is already enrolled in NCD program_
_Mtumizeni kuchipatala kuti akalandire thandizo la kulera._
_Wonetsetsani kuti mwatumiza tsambali kuti mumalize ntchito iyi._
_Mpelekezeni kwa a SCHW kuti akapeleke makhololo._
_ is already enrolled in TB program_
Nambala ya ART EMR yomwe mwalowetsayi mwayitenga kuti?
Gwilitsani ntchito uthenga watsopano mu buku la ku chipatala
Kodi analowetsedwa kale mu pologalamu ART
Kodi nambala yopelekedwa kwa munthu amene ali pa ART ilipo?
_Tsimikizani ngati nambala ya EMR ikugwilizana ndi ya mu m'buku la kuchipatala. Ngati zikusiyana konzani._
Gwilitsani ntchito uthenga watsopano mu buku la ku chipatala
Tsiku likhale la mkatikati mwa masiku 31 apitawo
Simungasankhe "Sindikudziwa" ngati mwasankha kale yankho lina
Nthenda yomwe inapangitsa kuti agonekedwa m'chipatala

**Zitetezeni inu komanso anzanu ku matenda a Covid 19. Sambani mmanja kawirikawiri ndi madzi komanso sopo, Khalani motalikirana pafupifupi ma mita awiri, Musakhudzane ndi aliyense pamene mukugwira ntchiton yanu, ndipo mukhale kunyumba ngati mwatentha thupi, kutsokomola komanso kubanika kupuma.**
Gwilitsani ntchito uthenga watsopano mu buku la ku chipatala
Kodi nambala yopelekedwa kwa munthu amene ali pa matenda a mgonagona ilipo?
Kodi analowetsedwa kale mu pologalamu ya matenda a mgonagona
Onaninso pasipoti ya thanzi ya mtundu wa thanzi labwino.
_Tsimikizani ngati nambala ya EMR ikugwilizana ndi ya mu m'buku la kuchipatala. Ngati zikusiyana konzani._
Nambala ya NCD EMR yomwe mwalowetsayi mwayitenga kuti?
Kumva mau kapena kuchita zinthu zachilendo
Kutupa kwambiri kwa m'munsi mwa miyendo komanso molumikiza mapazi ndi miyendo
Kuvutika kupuma akamakwera mtunda kapena akagona zomwe zikuyipirayipirabe
Chongani chizindikiro china chili chonse chomwe ali nacho
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale china!
Kodi ali ndi zina mwa zizindikiro izi?
Chongani chizindikiro china chiri chonse chomwe chiri chofunika
Zitsanzo- nthenda yokutha magazi, nthenda ya chiwindi, kufa ziwalo, nthenda youmitsa mafupa
Gwilitsani ntchito uthenga watsopano mu buku la ku chipatala
_Malingana ndi momwe mbiri ya iliri, mufufuzeni pa nkhani ya:_
Tsimikizani za ma ulendo a kusikelo powona buku la ku chipatala
Wayenda ma ulendo angati a ku sikelo ya amayi apakati kufikila pano?
Kupweteka kwa mutu, chizungulire kapenga nkhungu mmaso
Musasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha chizindikilo chowopysa
Kodi mai akudziwa Tsiku lomwe anasamba komaliza?
Pakati pa miyezi isanu ndi isanu ndi umodzi
Pakati pa miyezi isanu ndi iwiri ndi isanu ndi itatu
Tsiku lomwe akuganizira kuti anamaliza nsambo omaliza
Tsiku losamba lomaliza lisapitilire miyezi 9 yapitayo kapena mtsogolomo
Kodi 's nsambo wake womaliza anayamba liti?
_Mupelekezeni mai kuchipatala kuti akayambe sikelo kuti iye ndi mwana womuyembekezerayo akhale athanzi ndi kukonzekera kukachilira ku chipatala._
_Tsimikizani nkhani ya pakati pa mai kuchokera mu bukhu la kuchipatala._
Kodi analowetsedwa kale mu pologalamu ya TB?
_Mpelekezeni kwa a SCHW kuti akapeleke makhololo._
_Akumbutseni wosamalira kuti awonetsetse kuti amatsatira mankhwala_
Pelekezani ku chipatala kuti akalandire chithandizo china
Sankhani chizindikiro china chili chonse chomwe ali nacho
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale china!
Kodi ali ndi zina mwa zizindikiro izi?
Kodi anaikidwa pa mankhwala a TB?
Pakati pa miyezi isanu ndi isanu ndi umodzi
Pakati pa miyezi isanu ndi iwiri ndi isanu ndi itatu
Kupweteka kwa mutu, chizungulire kapenga nkhungu mmaso
Kuvutika kupuma akamakwera mtunda kapena akagona zomwe zikuyipirayipirabe
Kutupa kwambiri kwa m'munsi mwa miyendo komanso molumikiza mapazi ndi miyendo
Kumva mau kapena kuchita zinthu zachilendo
Akuwona zizindikilo zachilendo kamba kogwiritsa ntchito njira za kulera
Abambo akunyumba sakufuna kuti azigwiritsa ntchito njira zakulera
Kutsokomola kwa tsiku lina liri lonse
Sakufuna kuulula ngati akutenga njira za kulera

bind.relevant: (../../patient_sex = 'female' and ../../patient_age_in_years >= 15 and ../../patient_age_in_years <= 49 and (../../days_since_delivery < 0 or ../../days_since_delivery > 42) and ../../pregnant != 'yes' and ../../is_in_fp != 'yes') or (../../pregnant != 'yes' and ../../patient_sex = 'female' and ../../patient_age_in_years > 11 and ../../patient_age_in_years < 50 and ../../is_in_fp = 'yes' and ../../fp_method != 'tubal_ligation')

bind.calculate: if(selected(../tb_symptoms, 'cough') or selected(../tb_symptoms, 'cough_art') or (selected(../tb_symptoms, 'fever') and selected(../tb_symptoms, 'weight_loss')) or (selected(../tb_symptoms, 'fever') and selected(../tb_symptoms, 'night_sweats')) or (selected(../tb_symptoms, 'weight_loss') and selected(../tb_symptoms, 'night_sweats')), 'yes', 'no')

if((selected(../tb_symptoms, 'cough') or selected(../tb_symptoms, 'cough_art') or selected(../tb_symptoms, 'fever') or selected(../tb_symptoms, 'weight_loss')) and /over_5_screening/c_last_tb_results = 'negative', 'yes', 'no')

bind.relevant: (selected(../tb_symptoms, 'cough') or selected(../tb_symptoms, 'cough_art') or selected(../tb_symptoms, 'fever') or selected(../tb_symptoms, 'weight_loss')) and /over_5_screening/c_last_tb_results = 'negative'

../patient_sex = 'female' and ../patient_age_in_years >= 15 and ../patient_age_in_years <= 49 and (../days_since_delivery < 0 or ../days_since_delivery > 42) and ../pregnant != 'yes' and not(../is_in_fp = 'yes' and ../fp_method='tubal_ligation')

not(selected(../pregnancy_screening/pregnant, 'yes')) and ../patient_sex = 'female' and ../patient_age_in_years >= 15 and ../patient_age_in_years <= 49 and (../days_since_delivery < 0 or ../days_since_delivery > 42) and ../pregnant != 'yes' and ../is_in_fp != 'yes'

bind.calculate: if(decimal-date-time(../anc_1) < decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/c_lmp_date ), 'ANC visit cannot be before LMP', if(decimal-date-time(../anc_1) > decimal-date-time(today()), 'ANC visit cannot be in future.', 'More than one ANC visit cannot be attended on one date'))

if(decimal-date-time(../anc_1) < decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/c_lmp_date ), 'Sitingakhale ndi ulendo woyamba wa sikelo ya Amayi oyembekezera mmbuyo mwa tsiku lomwe anayamba nsambo womaliza. Sankhani tsiku lina', if(decimal-date-time(../anc_1) > decimal-date-time(today()), 'Tsiku la ulendo woyamba wa sikelo ya Amayi oyembekezera silingakhale mtsogolo. Sankhani tsiku lina', 'Maulendo opitilira a ANC sangathe kupezeka pa tsiku limodzi. Sankhani tsiku lina'))

if(decimal-date-time(../anc_2) < decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/c_lmp_date ), 'ANC visit cannot be before LMP', if(decimal-date-time(../anc_2) > decimal-date-time(today()), 'ANC visit cannot be in future.', 'More than one ANC visit cannot be attended on one date'))

if(decimal-date-time(../anc_2) < decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/c_lmp_date ), 'Sitingakhale ndi ulendo woyamba wa sikelo ya Amayi oyembekezera mmbuyo mwa tsiku lomwe anayamba nsambo womaliza. Sankhani tsiku lina', if(decimal-date-time(../anc_2) > decimal-date-time(today()), 'Tsiku la ulendo woyamba wa sikelo ya Amayi oyembekezera silingakhale mtsogolo. Sankhani tsiku lina', 'Maulendo opitilira a ANC sangathe kupezeka pa tsiku limodzi. Sankhani tsiku lina'))

if(decimal-date-time(../anc_3) < decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/c_lmp_date ), 'ANC visit cannot be before LMP', if(decimal-date-time(../anc_3) > decimal-date-time(today()), 'ANC visit cannot be in future.', 'More than one ANC visit cannot be attended on one date'))

if(decimal-date-time(../anc_3) < decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/c_lmp_date ), 'Sitingakhale ndi ulendo woyamba wa sikelo ya Amayi oyembekezera mmbuyo mwa tsiku lomwe anayamba nsambo womaliza. Sankhani tsiku lina', if(decimal-date-time(../anc_3) > decimal-date-time(today()), 'Tsiku la ulendo woyamba wa sikelo ya Amayi oyembekezera silingakhale mtsogolo. Sankhani tsiku lina', 'Maulendo opitilira a ANC sangathe kupezeka pa tsiku limodzi. Sankhani tsiku lina'))

if(decimal-date-time(../anc_4) < decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/c_lmp_date ), 'ANC visit cannot be before LMP', if(decimal-date-time(../anc_4) > decimal-date-time(today()), 'ANC visit cannot be in future.', 'More than one ANC visit cannot be attended on one date'))

if(decimal-date-time(../anc_4) < decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/c_lmp_date ), 'Sitingakhale ndi ulendo woyamba wa sikelo ya Amayi oyembekezera mmbuyo mwa tsiku lomwe anayamba nsambo womaliza. Sankhani tsiku lina', if(decimal-date-time(../anc_4) > decimal-date-time(today()), 'Tsiku la ulendo woyamba wa sikelo ya Amayi oyembekezera silingakhale mtsogolo. Sankhani tsiku lina', 'Maulendo opitilira a ANC sangathe kupezeka pa tsiku limodzi. Sankhani tsiku lina'))

bind.constraint: decimal-date-time(.) <= decimal-date-time(today()) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_2 ) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_3 ) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_4 ) and decimal-date-time(.) > decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/c_lmp_date )

decimal-date-time(.) <= decimal-date-time(today()) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_1 ) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_3 ) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_4 ) and decimal-date-time(.) > decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/c_lmp_date )

decimal-date-time(.) <= decimal-date-time(today()) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_1 ) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_2 ) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_4 ) and decimal-date-time(.) > decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/c_lmp_date )

decimal-date-time(.) <= decimal-date-time(today()) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_1 ) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_2 ) and decimal-date-time(.) != decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_3 ) and decimal-date-time(.) > decimal-date-time( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/c_lmp_date )

bind.calculate: if(../edd < today(), 'EDD cannot be in the past.', if(difference-in-months( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/c_lmp_date , ../edd) > 10, 'EDD should not be more than 10 months from LMP. Enter correct EDD.', 'EDD should not be more than 10 months from LMP. Enter correct EDD.'))

if(../edd < today(), 'Tsiku silingakhale la mbuyo.', if(difference-in-months( /over_5_screening/pregnancy_registration/fields/c_lmp_date , ../edd) > 10, 'EDD sikuyenera kupitilira miyezi 10 kuchokera ku LMP. Lowetsani EDD yolondola.', 'EDD sikuyenera kupitilira miyezi 10 kuchokera ku LMP. Lowetsani EDD yolondola.'))

if(selected(../danger_signs, 'bleeding') or selected(../danger_signs, 'swelling') or selected(../danger_signs, 'fever') or selected(../danger_signs, 'headache_dizziness') or selected(../danger_signs, 'lower_abdominal_pain') or selected(../danger_signs, 'convulsions') or selected(../danger_signs, 'water_bag_breaks'), 'yes', 'no')

if(selected(../danger_signs, 'constipation') or selected(../danger_signs, 'nausea') or selected(../danger_signs, 'muscle_cramps') or selected(../danger_signs, 'haemorrhoids') and ../refer_and_accompany = 'no', 'yes', 'no')

bind.relevant: ../pregnant != 'yes' and ../patient_sex = 'female' and ../patient_age_in_years > 11 and ../patient_age_in_years < 50 and ../is_in_fp = 'yes' and ../fp_method != 'implant' and ../fp_method != 'iucd' and not(selected(../pregnancy_screening/pregnant, 'yes'))

bind.calculate: if( /over_5_screening/c_fp_method = 'pills', 'Pills', if( /over_5_screening/c_fp_method = 'iucd', 'Intrauterine Device (IUCD)', if( /over_5_screening/c_fp_method = 'implant', 'Implant', if( /over_5_screening/c_fp_method = 'tubal_ligation', 'Tubal Ligation', if( /over_5_screening/c_fp_method = 'depo_provera', 'Injection/Depo-Provera', '')))))

bind.relevant: (selected(../changed_fp_method, 'no') and (../../fp_method = 'implant' or ../../fp_method = 'iucd' or ../../fp_method = 'depo_provera' )) or (selected(../changed_fp_method, 'yes') and (../new_fp_method = 'implant' or ../new_fp_method = 'iucd' or ../new_fp_method = 'depo_provera'))

bind.calculate: if( /over_5_screening/hiv_screening/fields/last_hiv_test = 0, 'Never tested', if( /over_5_screening/hiv_screening/fields/last_hiv_test = 3, 'Tested within the last 3 months', 'Tested more than 3 months ago'))

if(not(selected(../../pregnancy_registration/fields/danger_signs, 'none')) and count-selected(../../pregnancy_registration/fields/danger_signs) >= 1 , 'ANC danger signs present', 'No ANC danger signs')
if(selected(../../fp_screening/fields/side_effects, 'yes'), 'FP side effects present', 'No FP side effects')

if((selected(../../tb_screening/fields/tb_symptoms, 'cough') or selected(../../tb_screening/fields/tb_symptoms, 'cough_art') or (selected(../../tb_screening/fields/tb_symptoms, 'fever') and selected(../../tb_screening/fields/tb_symptoms, 'weight_loss')) or (selected(../../tb_screening/fields/tb_symptoms, 'fever') and selected(../../tb_screening/fields/tb_symptoms, 'night_sweats')) or (selected(../../tb_screening/fields/tb_symptoms, 'weight_loss') and selected(../../tb_screening/fields/tb_symptoms, 'night_sweats'))) , 'TB signs present', 'No TB signs')

if( /over_5_screening/hiv_screening/fields/last_hiv_test = 0, 'Never tested', if( /over_5_screening/hiv_screening/fields/last_hiv_test = 3, 'Tested within the last 3 months', 'Tested more than 3 months ago'))
if(not(selected(../../ncd_screening/ncd_symptoms, 'none')) and count-selected(../../ncd_screening/ncd_symptoms) >= 1, 'Ali ndi zizindikiro za NCD', 'Alibe zizindikiro za NCD')

if(not(selected(../../pregnancy_registration/fields/danger_signs, 'none')) and count-selected(../../pregnancy_registration/fields/danger_signs) >= 1 , 'Ali ndi zizindikiro zoopsa za pakati', 'Alibe zizindikiro zoopsa za pakati')
if(selected(../../fp_screening/fields/side_effects, 'yes'), 'Ali ndi zizindikiro zoopsa za kulera', 'Alibe zizindikiro zoopsa za kulera')

if(selected(../../hospitalization_details/fields/hospitalized_this_month, 'yes'), concat( /over_5_screening/c_patient_name , ' Anagonekedwa mchipatala'), concat( /over_5_screening/c_patient_name , ' Sanagonekedwe mchipatala'))

if((selected(../../tb_screening/fields/tb_symptoms, 'cough') or selected(../../tb_screening/fields/tb_symptoms, 'cough_art') or (selected(../../tb_screening/fields/tb_symptoms, 'fever') and selected(../../tb_screening/fields/tb_symptoms, 'weight_loss')) or (selected(../../tb_screening/fields/tb_symptoms, 'fever') and selected(../../tb_screening/fields/tb_symptoms, 'night_sweats')) or (selected(../../tb_screening/fields/tb_symptoms, 'weight_loss') and selected(../../tb_screening/fields/tb_symptoms, 'night_sweats'))) , 'Ali ndi zizindikiro za TB', 'Alibe zizindikiro za TB')

bind.relevant: ../../pregnant != 'yes' and ../../patient_sex = 'female' and ../../patient_age_in_years > 11 and ../../patient_age_in_years < 50 and ../../is_in_fp = 'yes' and not(selected(../../pregnancy_screening/pregnant, 'yes')) and not(selected(../../fp_follow_up/fields/side_effects, ''))

(not(selected(../../ncd_screening/ncd_symptoms, 'none')) and count-selected(../../ncd_screening/ncd_symptoms) >= 1) or (not(selected(../../pregnancy_registration/fields/danger_signs, 'none')) and count-selected(../../pregnancy_registration/fields/danger_signs) >= 1) or (selected(../../hiv_screening/fields/last_hiv_test, '0') or selected(../../hiv_screening/fields/last_hiv_test, '4')) or (selected(../../fp_screening/fields/wants_fp, 'yes') or selected(../../fp_screening/fields/side_effects, 'yes') or selected(../../fp_screening/fields/change_fp, 'yes')) or (selected(../../pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_visits, '0'))

(not(selected(../../ncd_screening/ncd_symptoms, 'none')) and count-selected(../../ncd_screening/ncd_symptoms) >= 1) or (not(selected(../../pregnancy_registration/fields/danger_signs, 'none')) and count-selected(../../pregnancy_registration/fields/danger_signs) >= 1) or (selected(../../hiv_screening/fields/last_hiv_test, '0') or selected(../../hiv_screening/fields/last_hiv_test, '4')) or (selected(../../fp_screening/fields/wants_fp, 'yes') or selected(../../fp_screening/fields/side_effects, 'yes') or selected(../../fp_screening/fields/change_fp, 'yes')) or (selected(../../pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_visits, '0'))

(not(selected(../../ncd_screening/ncd_symptoms, 'none')) and count-selected(../../ncd_screening/ncd_symptoms) >= 1) or (not(selected(../../pregnancy_registration/fields/danger_signs, 'none')) and count-selected(../../pregnancy_registration/fields/danger_signs) >= 1) or (selected(../../hiv_screening/fields/last_hiv_test, '0') or selected(../../hiv_screening/fields/last_hiv_test, '4')) or (selected(../../fp_screening/fields/wants_fp, 'yes') or selected(../../fp_screening/fields/side_effects, 'yes') or selected(../../fp_screening/fields/change_fp, 'yes')) or (selected(../../pregnancy_registration/fields/anc_visits, '0'))

itemset.nodeset: instance('hospitalization_reasons')/root/item[is_in_art = /over_5_screening/is_in_art_group or is_in_tb = /over_5_screening/is_in_tb_group or is_in_ncd = /over_5_screening/is_in_ncd_group or is_in_pregnancy = /over_5_screening/is_in_pregnancy_group or is_in_others = /over_5_screening/is_in_others_group ]
